entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
